entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AOT built binary for aarch64 android fails to run on Nvidia Shield TV #96592
  • JIT: Loop unrolling does not validate predecessor BBJ_COND condition properly #96591
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Span parameter that could be a ReadOnlySpan parameter #96587

Closed

  • JIT: CMOV aka CMOVcc not generated when method is inlined. #96593
  • Add back netfx test run in System.IO.FileSystem #31256
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Move `BBF_OLD_LOOP_HEADER_QUIRK` into old loop finding #96595
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test for GetInterfaces() array type #96589
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Faster IndexOfAny for IgnoreCase Ascii letters #96588
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.199, windows: 120.0.6099.199 #96586
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Clean up some of the ARM32 bit rotten code #96583
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove defunct netfx tests #96435
    area-Meta
  • PGO: Profiled SequenceEqual #96571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Using HashSet instead of Dictionary multiple times #96573
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix links in features.md #96582
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix some IDExx analyzer suggestions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #96584
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • Use pattern value in the summary for the generated regex method. #96488
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Replace LINQ's ArrayBuilder, LargeArrayBuilder, and SparseArrayBuilder with new SegmentedArrayBuilder #96570
    area-System.Linq, 9.0.0
